channel.title: Help Changing Npc outfit!
channel.description:
Yo Guys It Shay Here, im wondring how to change npc outfit cause i saw npc's with eqiupments good stuff are players wear it like an example i saw
Name Of Npc : Death stalker hat/helmet : infinty hat cape : magic skill cape (t) body : 3rd age range top legs : 3rd age range legs boots : dragon boots :eek: --------- I Realy guys need to know so who will help ill realy apprecaite that :)
